ar: وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَهًا ءَاخَرَ
en: And those who do not invoke with Allah another deity

ar: وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ النَّفْسَ الَّتِى حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ
en: or kill the soul which Allah has forbidden [to be killed],
and do not commit unlawful sexual intercourse.
And whoever should do that will meet a penalty.
Multiplied for him is the punishment on the Day of Resurrection,
and he will abide therein humiliated -

ar: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَلِحًا
en: Except for those who repent, believe and do righteous work.
For them Allah will replace their evil deeds with good.
And ever is Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
